reviewText: GREAT VIDEO...even better to watch in real life!!.. tons of great footage.

These videos just keep getting more polished as the years pass. This is the best off-road event in the USA and it takes place on your land (Public Land) here in the Southern California Desert every February. Come out and see the show then buy the video because this thing is too massive to see everything in one viewing!

quite possibly the best documentary storyline footage of the whole "King Of The Hammers" series. I felt as if i was there. hearing the dust i could almost smell the racefuel. Shot with capturing intencity, heartache and "Vindication". Epic. Great job HMC.
